page.title: 01School 1
page.content: {East Halton County School }has three classes in 1985.{Class 1}is for the oldest, aged from 9 to 11,{class 2}is for those who are aged from 6 to 8, and{class 3}is for those aged from 5 to 6. This year there are only 42 children in the school, last year there were 65. I like a small school better because you can get lost in a big one. I like Physical Education, Art and Craft best. One of my friends likes Mathematics best. It is a very old school built in 1872. Even my dad came to it when he was little. From the outside the school looks a bit like a church. Inside there are {four}classrooms, we use one as a hall for P.E. We sit on metal framed chairs with plastic seats and write on plastic covered tables.
